citethispage-desc: Nambahaké kaca astaméwa [[Special:Cite|sitat (kutipan)]] lan pranala ing kothak piranti
tooltip-citethispage: Katerangan bab carané nyitir kaca iki

__NOTOC__
== Rerincèning kapustakan tumrap {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Jeneng kaca: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Panganggit: {{SITENAME}} kontributor * Panyithak: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Tanggal rèvisi pungkasan: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Tanggal njupuk: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * URL permanèn: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * ID Vèrsi Kaca: {{REVISIONID}}
== Gagrag sitiran tumrap {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[APA style|Gagrag APA]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Dijupuk {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} saka {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[The MLA style manual|Gagrag MLA]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[MHRA Style Guide|Gagrag MHRA]] === {{SITENAME}} kontributor, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [diaksès {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|Gagrag Chicago]] === {{SITENAME}} kontributor, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (diaksès {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Council of Science Editors|Gagrag CBE/CSE]] === {{SITENAME}} kontributor. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [dikutip {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Sumadhiya saka: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|Gagrag Bluebook]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (ditekani pungkasan {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Isi [[BibTeX]] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Online; diaksès {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Yèn nganggo url pakèt [[LaTeX]] (\usepackage{url} ngendi waé nèng pambuka) sing bakal ndadèkaké alamat wèb sing dipormat dadi luwih èndah, sing ngisor iki disaranaké: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Online; diaksès {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
